pages.text: $(li)Bee Nest are naturally generated blocks in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/plains)Plains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/sunflower_plains)Sunflower Plains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/forest)Forest$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/birch_forest)Birch Forest$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/flower_forest)Flower Forest$(/l), of the Overworld where $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/bee)Bees$(/l) live.$(br)$(li)To harvest $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/honey_bottle)Honey$(/l), you have to right click on the Bee Nest while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/glass_bottle)Glass Bottle$(/l) in your hand.

$(li)To harvest $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/honeycomb)Honeycomb$(/l), you have to right click on the Bee Nest while you are holding $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l) in your hand.$(br)$(li)After harvesting, you will have to wait until obtain more Honey again.$(br)$(li)Harvesting from a Bee Nest causes any bees inside it becomes aggressive to you, unless there is a fire directly beneath it or a lit $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l) within five blocks below, and the smoke is not obstructed.
